name: LumenBrink
description:
You've been assigned to project LumenBrink.  

You're excavating a strange planet in search of an artifact.  Your employer thought having more teams would make the search go faster.  Now it's your job to coordinate the various excavators to make sure they fully dig up each layer, and return to their corresponding collection site.

How to Play

This is based on a popular puzzle, Numberlink (anagram of LUMENBRINK).  

  • Draw paths connecting each truck to the final destination.  You can either use the mouse to drag, keyboard, or gamepad.
  • All tiles must be visited exactly ones.
Credit
  • Built using the Quadplay game engine.
  • numberlink for help generating puzzles.
  • Art used the farmland-20 palette.
  • Sfx generated with sfxr.
  • Music generated with MelodyBrains.

Made for Ludem-Dare 48.
